content.body: is there any way to search through Web API specs for the reference to certain definition?  I'm looking into the consumers of [incumbent](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#incumbent) to see when and how it's used in what kind of situations, and now I'm wondering if it's also used from other specs.  So far I find some references in the WebIDL spec
